pgr.info.grabStrength3: Grab Strength: Tile Entities + Large Entities
pgr.info.grabStrength4: Grab Strength: Tile Entities + Very Large Entities
portalgun.config.cat.pgr.comment: Config options relating to the use of the Portal Gun
portalgun.config.prop.canPortalsResizeWh: Portals Can Be Resized When Created
portalgun.config.prop.portalgunIndicator:
The size of the indicator around the crosshairs when you hold the Portal Gun.
Value is in percentage
0 to disable.
Enable rendering to see through portals?

If your PC does not support this, you will not be able to see through portals even if this was enabled.
portalgun.config.prop.fancyPortals.comme:
Enable rendering portals with shaders?

If your PC does not support this, shaders will not be used even if this was enabled.
portalgun.config.prop.keyGrab.comment: Key to grab blocks/entities with the Portal Gun
portalgun.config.prop.keyReset.comment: Key to reset portals of your Portal Gun
portalgun.config.prop.keyZoom.comment: Key to zoom and unzoom the Portal Gun
portalgun.config.prop.equipItemSound.com: Play a sound when the Portal Gun is equipped?
portalgun.config.prop.entityGrabWeightBa:
Base Weight that the Portal Gun is allowed to carry, in percentile (%)
Set this to 0 to disable grabbing of blocks and entities which are not part of this mod.
portalgun.config.prop.maxShootDistance.c: Maximum distance to fire portals from the Portal Gun.
portalgun.config.prop.canFireThroughGlas: Can the projectile fired by the Portal Gun go through glass?
portalgun.config.prop.canFireThroughLiqu: Can the projectile fired by the Portal Gun go through liquid?
portalgun.config.prop.canPortalsResizeWh: Can the portal that spawns from the projectile be resized downwards if the full size won't fit?
portalgun.config.prop.canPortalProjectil:
Can the portal projectile (that you fire from the portal gun) chunk load?
Disabling this might cause issues.
